verses.name: Colossians 2:10
verses.text: And ye are complete in him, which is the head of all principality and power:

verses.name: Colossians 2:11
verses.text: In whom also ye are circumcised with the circumcision made without hands, in putting off the body of the sins of the flesh by the circumcision of Christ:

verses.name: Colossians 2:12
verses.text: Buried with him in baptism, wherein also ye are risen with him through the faith of the operation of God, who hath raised him from the dead.

verses.name: Colossians 2:13
verses.text: And you, being dead in your sins and the uncircumcision of your flesh, hath he quickened together with him, having forgiven you all trespasses;
